findings.liver: The liver is diffusely echogenic consistent with hepatic steatosis. There is no focal liver mass. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. There is no ascites.
findings.bile_ducts: There is no intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CBD measures 0.5 cm.
findings.gallbladder: Innumerable stones are seen filling the lumen of the gallbladder. Additionally, there is gallbladder wall edema.
findings.pancreas: The pancreas is unremarkable but is only partially visualized due to overlying bowel gas.
findings.spleen: The spleen is normal measuring 10.1 cm.
findings.kidneys: No hydronephrosis is seen in either kidney. The right kidney measures 10.8 cm and the left kidney measures 10.6 cm. A peripheral echogenicity consistent with a nonobstructing crystal measuring 9 mm is incidentally noted at the upper pole of the left kidney.
findings.retroperitoneum: The aorta is of normal caliber and the visualized portion of the IVC is within normal limits.
